SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.codehaus.preon.annotation
Annotation Type Choices

public @interface Choices

The annotation allowing you to define a number of choices, based a prefix of a certain size.

Author:
Wilfred Springer (wis)

Optional Element Summary
 Choices.Choice[] alternatives
          The choices to select from.
 ByteOrder byteOrder
          The byte order to take into account when returning a representation of the first size bits read as a prefix.
 Class<?> defaultType
          The default type, if any.
 int prefixSize
          The number of bits to be read for determining the prefix.
 

prefixSize

public abstract int prefixSize
The number of bits to be read for determining the prefix.

Returns:
The number of bits to be read for determining the prefix.
Default:
0

byteOrder

public abstract ByteOrder byteOrder
The byte order to take into account when returning a representation of the first size bits read as a prefix.

Returns:
The byte order to take into account when returning a representation of the first size bits read as a prefix.
Default:
org.codehaus.preon.buffer.ByteOrder.BigEndian

alternatives

public abstract Choices.Choice[] alternatives
The choices to select from.

Returns:
The choices to select from.
Default:
{}

defaultType

public abstract Class<?> defaultType
The default type, if any.

Default:
java.lang.Void.class
